questions.text: What fruit does Kramer bring into Jerry's apartment in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Cantaloupe.

	Kramer insists that Jerry should have some because he got it at Joe's Market for forty-nine cents.

questions.text: What is the name of George's girlfriend in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Marlene.

	George thinks that Marlene is boring so he breaks up with her, but he nearly doesn't because she begins to cry.

questions.text: What does George leave at his ex-girlfriend's apartment?
questions.explanation:
Books.

	George realizes that he left the books at Marlene's house after he breaks up with her, and he tries to find a way to get them back.

questions.text: What kind of doctor does George need to visit?
questions.explanation:
Chiropractor.

	Jerry recommends the chiropractor to George after he complains about his back.  Jerry accompanies George to the office.

True.

	He eventually takes her out for lunch and to see a movie.  This becomes Jerry's third girlfriend of the series, and it was George's second.

questions.text: When George's ex-girlfriend calls Jerry, what does she talk about on the answering machine?
questions.explanation:
Bathing.

	Marlene asks Jerry if he's ever bathed in the dark.  Kramer asks Jerry if George knows that he's seeing Marlene, but Jerry says he doesn't.

questions.text: What does Elaine complain about when she goes to Jerry's apartment?
questions.explanation:
The elevator.

	Elaine states that the elevator in Jerry's apartment building is the slowest in the city, but Jerry says that's fine because he never need to be home on time.

questions.text: What does George swallow in Monk's Restaurant?
questions.explanation:
A fly.

	George begins to freak out after swallowing a fly, but he seems okay that Jerry has been dating Marlene.

questions.text: What occupation does George's ex-girlfriend have?
questions.explanation:
Cashier.

	Marlene decides to end her relationship with Jerry after she sees his comedy act at a club.  She decides she can't respect him after the routine.

questions.text: Does Kramer have a girlfriend in this episode?
questions.explanation:
No.

	As a matter of fact, Kramer hasn't appeared outside Jerry's apartment in any episodes to this point.  Within a few episodes, he will leave the apartment.
